acceptTerms: I accept the terms and conditions
accessRequested: Removal for the restriction has been requested, please wait for our team to revert
activationSuccess: Your account has been activated, you will be redirected to login page.
addNewNamespace: You can add a new namespace below
adminPermissionProject: Admin permission is required to connect project to JIRA
capturedApiEmptyTitle: No APIs captured during the last dynamic scan. Please try again
capturedApiEmptyDesc:
1. Make sure you go through all views of the app during the dynamic scan
2. Check if correct API URL filters are set
3. Ensure SSL pinning is not enabled in app
compareWarningOldFile: You are comparing an old file with new file, the status below will not be accurate.
compareSummary1: You are comparing file of ID
credentialsNotUpdated: Something went wrong when trying to update credentials
deviceIsReady: The Device is ready to be connected
deviceNotFound: Hard time for us to find the device
deviceSelected: You have successfully selected the device
dynamicScanText: Please refresh the page if the scan doesn't start in 1-2 mins
enterRightTeamName: Enter the right team name to delete it
enterRightUserName: Enter the right username to delete it
errorWhileUploading: Error while uploading file to presigned URL
falsePositive: Is this a false positive? you can override this analysis here
fetchGitHubRepoFailed: Something went wrong when trying to fetch repo list
fetchProjectFailed: Something went wrong when trying to fetch projects list
fileUploadedSuccessfully: File Uploaded Successfully. Please wait while we process your file.
githubWillBeRevoked: Your GitHub authorization will be revoked in a moment
gotoSettings: is not integrated, you can go to settings & integrate by
reconnectGotoSettings: is not integrated, something went wrong you can go to settings & reconnect by
hangInThere: Hang in there while we process your URL
integratedGithub: This project is integrated with GitHub repo
integratedJIRA: This project is integrated with JIRA project
jiraWillBeRevoked: Your JIRA authorization will be revoked in a moment
jiraNoProject: Linked JIRA account doesn't have any projects
githubNoProject: Linked JIRA account doesn't have any projects
mfaEnabled: Multi Factor Authentication is now enabled
mfaDisabled: Multi Factor Authentication is now disabled
mfaDescription: Multi Factor Authentication provides another layer of security to your account
name: Name
networkError: A network error occured! Please try again later
newScanStarted: New scan started, Click here to show
noProjectUploaded: You haven't uploaded any project yet
noTeamsMessage: You haven't created any team except Default Team which is added to the project by default
passwordLengthError: Passwords must be greater than or equal to 6
trialWillBeConverted: Your free trial will be converted into paid subscription on
personalAccessTokenDesc: Tokens you have generated that can be used to access the Appknox API
proxyWarning: Please check if you have enabled proxy
proxySettingsDescription: Route dynamic scan and API scan requests via proxy server
proxySettingsRouteVia: Routing all API requests during dynamic scan & API scan via
registerConfirmation: Thank you for registering with Appknox. An activation link has been send to the email provided.
invitationRegisterConfirmation: Thank you for registering with Appknox. Please login to continue.
reportIsGettingGenerated: Please wait while the report is getting generated
requestToAddNamespace: We have received your request to add a new namespace
failedGitHubProject: Something went wrong in getting the integrated project.
repoNotIntegrated: Something went wrong when trying to update this repo
riskAndCommentRequired: Risk and comment are required fields
showHiddenAnalysis: Do you want to show the hidden analysis in the Report?
somethingWentWrong: Something went wrong, please try again
successfullyOverridden: You have successfully overridden this analysis
successfullyReset: You have successfully reverted back to orginal risk of this analysis
teamRemoved: Team removed from accessing this project
title: Title
uploadNewProject: You can upload a new project by clicking on Upload App above and start scanning
vulnerabilityPreferencesCondition: Changes made to vulnerability here will be applied to all future analyses of this project
vulnerabilityPreferencesEdit: You can edit the vulnerability preferences below
youCanCreateTeam: you can create a new team by

confirmBox.removeURL: Are you sure you want to remove from url filters?
confirmBox.removeProject: Are you sure you want to remove Github Project?
confirmBox.removeProjectCollaborator: Are you sure you want to remove this collaborator?
confirmBox.removeProjectTeam: Are you sure you want to remove this team from project?
confirmBox.removeTeamProject: Are you sure you want to remove this project from team?
confirmBox.removeJIRA: Are you sure you want to remove JIRA Project?
confirmBox.revokeGithub: Are you sure you want to revoke Github Integration?
confirmBox.revokeJira: Are you sure you want to revoke JIRA Integration?
confirmBox.cancelSubsciption: Are you sure you want to cancel Subscription?
confirmBox.rejectNamespace: Are you sure you want to delete this namespace?
confirmBox.revokePersonalToken: Are you sure you want to delete this personal access token?
confirmBox.removeUserRole: Are you sure you want to remove this role?
confirmBox.deleteInvitation: Are you sure you want to delete this invitation?
confirmBox.resendInvitation: Are you sure you want to resend this invitation?

removeMemberPrompt.title: Are you sure you want to remove this team member?
removeMemberPrompt.description: Please enter the name of team member who you want to remove

deleteTeamPrompt.title: Are you sure you want to delete this team?
deleteTeamPrompt.description: Please enter the team name which you want to delete

enableMFA.title: Enable Multi Factor Authentication
enableMFA.description: Multi Factor Authentication adds an extra layer of security to your account. In addition to your username and password, you’ll need to enter a code generated on your phone.
enableMFA.downloadAppOTP: Download one of these apps to get the OTP:
enableMFA.extraDescription: Multi Factor Authentication adds another layer of security to your account so if your password is compromised or stolen, only you can log in.
enableMFA.scanBarcode: Scan this barcode with your app
enableMFA.enterCode: After scanning the barcode image, the app will display a six-digit code that you can enter below

disableMFA.title: Disable Multi Factor Authentication
disableMFA.description: If you turn off Multi Factor Authentication, your account will only be protected by your password.
disableMFA.enterOTP: To confirm, please enter the OTP

addTeam.title: Allow teams to access this project

dynamicScan.title: Dynamic Scan
dynamicScan.warning: Make sure you perform all the actions in the App, there are high chances that the scanner might mark the risk as passed
dynamicScan.apiScanDescription: During dynamic scan network traffic made by the app, filtered by the below provided API endpoints will be recorded. Currently traffic capturing is not supported for the apps that employ SSL pinning.

apiScan.title: API Scan
apiScan.description: We will run API scan for web vulnerabilities on the below list of requests captured during the dynamic scan.
apiScan.warning: API scan performs multiple automated tests that may result in denial of service or loss of data. Do not proceed if the app is configured to use a production API server.
apiScan.noDynamicScan: Please run dynamic scan with API URL filters set. That will capture APIs required for the API scan

devicePreference.title: Change Device Preference
devicePreference.note: changing the device preference won't affect the already running scan.

runAPIScan.title: Run API Scan
runAPIScan.noCapturedAPIsData: Oops, no captured API's found during dynamic scan

requestAccess.title: Request Access
requestAccess.description: Trial account does not have access to this feature

manual.title: Request Manual Scan
manual.description: We need some additional information in order to request for a manual scan
manual.appQuestion1: What would you like us to do in case some features cannot be accessed or are not live on the application?
manual.appQuestion1Answer1: Proceed with the scan & mention the features that were not scanned in the report. We will rescan it later.
manual.appQuestion1Answer2: Halt the scan, contact us & then proceed with the complete application scan.
manual.loginRequired: Does your application require an account to login?
manual.enterLoginDetails: Please enter the credentials required to login into the app (4 sets of credentials for each role)
manual.poc: Point of contact for queries pertaining to manual assessment
manual.vpnRequired: Is VPN/Proxy required to reach the app server from the client?
manual.enterVPNDetails: Please Enter the VPN Address & Port
manual.enterCredentails: If credentails are required, please enter the username & password

rescan.title: Re-scan Static Scan
rescan.description: Do you want to do the static scan again?

templates.enterEndpoint: Enter the API endpoint to scan: eg. api.appknox.com. Do not specify the scheme (http://...), port (:443/...) & path (.../users)

otherTemplates.showUntestedAnalysis: Do you want us to show untested analysis?
otherTemplates.specifyTheURL: Specify host names for filtering network requests during the dynamic scan. If left empty, all requests will be captured
otherTemplates.addATeam: Add a team which you want to collaborate with this project
otherTemplates.selectGHRepo: Select the Github Repo where you want us to create issues for the risks we find in your project
otherTemplates.selectJIRAAccount: Select the JIRA account where you want us to create issues for the risks we find in your project
otherTemplates.selectPreferredDevice: Select the Preferred Device Type and OS Version for Dynamic Scan
